sermons.title: (Worship - Part 3): Worship the Lord in Glory and Meekness
sermons.description: This is the third of five sermons on worshipping God by AW Tozer. Mr Tozer teaches on the need for the church to worship the Lord Jesus for what he is; not just a meek Jesus but the powerful Jesus of the Bible. Most of this sermon is unquoted scripture and is on the Glory of God.
